name: Solo Records
description:
Even asleep we partake in the becoming of the world.

{#temporary pause - reason: "must save own existence at the moment" - A.V. 05.07.18}

A gay furry non-linear mystery novel style dating sim VN

"You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams."

Solo Records tells the story of a young music student in the port town Avenida, following his journey into adulthood with all its joys and burdens, or in other words, the challenges of falling in love.

Experience the hardships of loving and caring about another person struggling with their very own world of troubles and afflictions, created by themselves, by others, or, eventually, by yourself.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you enjoyed my story, please consider supporting:

https://ko-fi.com/ardencevice

Writing, programming, art, main theme done by myself. Everything else is used under their respective usage rights. Necessary credits found in the game's "about".(all assets including images, sounds and music were rightfully used under their respective usage right (for ex. Creative Commons Zero (CC0) license (“free to use, share or modify, even commercially”))

A prototype.
Created with Ren'Py.
